# Welcome

Welcome to ENES 100. This e-book will be your official companion to the course. Here, you'll find:

-   A course overview of topics
-   Background and supplemental materials on the topics we cover in class, like mechanics, electronics, and programming
-   Course instructional materials
-   Detailed videos
-   Course policies and procedures

This book also serves as a reference for:

-   The Mission Overview for our class
-   Mission Specifications (what each team needs to accomplish)
-   Tools and Equipment available to you in the ENES 100 Labs
